DOC.brief_summary: This trial is a 14 week, randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled study, to assess the safety and efficacy of aripiprazole as adjunctive treatment to an ongoing antidepressant treatment in patients with Major Depressive Disorder.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Adjunctive Aripiprazole in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Men and women, 1865 years old Experienced a Major Depressive Disorder with the current episode of minimally 8 weeks in duration. Treatment history of an inadequate response to at least one and no more than three antidepressants.
